item.title: Linux Kernel Debugging
item.description: Trace max stack mount -t de bugfs nodev /sys/kernel/debug cat /proc/sys/kernel/stack_tracer_enabled echo 1 > /proc/sys/kernel/stack_tracer_enabled cat /sys/kernel/debug/tracing/stack_max_size -> 紀錄stack最大時多少 watch cat /sys/kernel/debug/tracing/stack_trace -> 對應的call stack trace
